Package org.opengrok.indexer.analysis

Class JFlexXref

java.lang.Object
org.opengrok.indexer.analysis.JFlexXref
All Implemented Interfaces:
NonSymbolMatchedListener, Resettable, SymbolMatchedListener, Xrefer
public class JFlexXref extends Object implements Xrefer, SymbolMatchedListener, NonSymbolMatchedListener
Author:
Lubos Kosco

      public void reset()
      Resets the instance. Normally, it only makes sense to call this method after calling setReader(java.io.Reader) to reset the instance's ScanningSymbolMatcher first as well.

    • appendLink

      protected void appendLink(String url) throws IOException
      Calls JFlexXrefUtils.appendLink(java.io.Writer, org.opengrok.indexer.analysis.JFlexLexer, java.lang.String, boolean, java.util.regex.Pattern) with the active Writer, the instance's ScanningSymbolMatcher, url, false, and null.
      Parameters:
      url - the URL to append
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while appending

    • write

      public void write(Writer out) throws IOException
      Write xref to the specified Writer.
      Specified by:
      write in interface Xrefer
      Parameters:
      out - xref destination
      Throws:
      IOException - on error when writing the xref

    • startNewLine

      public void startNewLine() throws IOException
      Terminate the current line and insert preamble for the next line. The line count is taken from JFlexStackingLexer.getLineNumber(). The lines-of-code count may be incremented if didSeePhysicalLOC has been set to true (after which it will be reset to false).
      Throws:
      IOException - on error when writing the xref

    • writeKeyword

      protected void writeKeyword(String symbol, int line) throws IOException
      Writes a keyword symbol.
      Parameters:
      symbol - the symbol to write
      line - the line number on which the symbol appears
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while writing to the stream

    • writeUnicodeChar

      protected void writeUnicodeChar(char c) throws IOException
      Calls JFlexXrefUtils.writeUnicodeChar(java.io.Writer, char) with the active Writer and c.
      Parameters:
      c - the character to write
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while writing to the stream

    • writeEMailAddress

      protected void writeEMailAddress(String address) throws IOException
      Write an e-mail address. The address will be obfuscated if RuntimeEnvironment.isObfuscatingEMailAddresses() returns true.
      Parameters:
      address - the address to write
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while writing to the stream
